nodes.text: Gavon Kroan was a male human serving the Galactic Republic on the planet Hoth during the Galactic War. Stationed at the Drift Hills Republic depot, he sent the Recon Company — men he personally trained — on a routine check into nearby caves. When they did not return in time, he got worried and asked a skilled Republic operative to rescue them. Thanks to his timely actions, all men were returned to base safely.
